TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BackgroundWorker extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 在不同執行緒上執行作業。

span.span: Executes an operation on a separate thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您在個別的專用執行緒上執行作業。The class allows you to run an operation on a separate, dedicated thread. 耗時的作業，例如下載和資料庫的交易可能會導致您的使用者介面 (UI) 看起來就好像它已停止回應時執行。Time-consuming operations like downloads and database transactions can cause your user interface (UI) to seem as though it has stopped responding while they are running. 當您想要回應式 UI，並會面臨這類作業，相關聯的長時間延遲類別提供方便的解決方案。When you want a responsive UI and you are faced with long delays associated with such operations, the class provides a convenient solution. 若要在背景執行耗時的作業，建立和接聽的報告作業和信號的進度，您的作業完成時的事件。To execute a time-consuming operation in the background, create a and listen for events that report the progress of your operation and signal when your operation is finished. 您可以建立以程式設計方式或將它拖曳至表單，從**元件**索引標籤**工具箱**。You can create the programmatically or you can drag it onto your form from the **Components** tab of the **Toolbox**. 如果您建立在 Windows Form 設計工具中，它會出現在元件匣中，和其屬性將會顯示在 [屬性] 視窗。If you create the in the Windows Forms Designer, it will appear in the Component Tray, and its properties will be displayed in the Properties window. 若要設定背景作業，加入事件處理常式事件。To set up for a background operation, add an event handler for the event. 這個事件處理常式中呼叫耗時的作業。Call your time-consuming operation in this event handler. 若要開始作業，請呼叫。To start the operation, call . 若要接收通知的進度更新，請處理事件。To receive notifications of progress updates, handle the event. 若要在作業完成時，收到通知，處理事件。To receive a notification when the operation is completed, handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 您必須小心，不要將任何使用者介面中操作物件您事件處理常式。You must be careful not to manipulate any user-interface objects in your event handler. 相反地，透過使用者介面進行通訊和事件。Instead, communicate to the user interface through the and events. > > 事件無法封送處理跨界限。 events are not marshaled across boundaries. 請勿使用元件來執行多執行緒的作業，在多個。Do not use a component to perform multithreaded operations in more than one . 如果您的背景作業需要參數，呼叫與您的參數。If your background operation requires a parameter, call with your parameter. 內部事件處理常式，您可以擷取從參數屬性。Inside the event handler, you can extract the parameter from the property. 如需 的詳細資訊，請參閱 [如何：在背景執行作業](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md)。For more information about , see [How to: Run an Operation in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範基本概念的類別以非同步方式執行耗時的作業。The following code example demonstrates the basics of the class for executing a time-consuming operation asynchronously. 下圖顯示輸出的範例。The following illustration shows an example of the output. ![BackgroundWorker 簡單範例](~/add/media/backgroundworker-simple.png "BackgroundWorker 簡單範例")![BackgroundWorker simple example](~/add/media/backgroundworker-simple.png "BackgroundWorker simple example") 若要試用此程式碼，建立在 Windows Forms 應用程式。To try this code, create a Windows Forms application. 新增控制項，名為`resultLabel`，並新增兩個控制項，名為`startAsyncButton`和`cancelAsyncButton`。Add a control named `resultLabel` and add two controls named `startAsyncButton` and `cancelAsyncButton`. 建立這兩個按鈕的事件處理常式。Create event handlers for both buttons. 從**元件**索引標籤的 [工具箱] 加入名元件`backgroundWorker1`。From the **Components** tab of the Toolbox, add a component named `backgroundWorker1`. 建立， ，並事件處理常式。Create , , and event handlers for the . 在表單的程式碼，請為下列程式碼取代現有的程式碼。In the code for the form, replace the existing code with the following code. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorkerSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.componentmodel.backgroundworkersimple/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorkerSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.componentmodel.backgroundworkersimple/vb/form1.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別以非同步方式執行耗時的作業。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class for executing a time-consuming operation asynchronously. 下圖顯示輸出的範例。The following illustration shows an example of the output. ![BackgroundWorker Fibonacci 範例](~/add/media/backgroundworker-fibonacci.png "BackgroundWorker Fibonacci 範例")![BackgroundWorker Fibonacci example](~/add/media/backgroundworker-fibonacci.png "BackgroundWorker Fibonacci example") 作業會計算所選的 Fibonacci 數字、 進度更新報告為計算會繼續進行，並允許取消擱置中的計算。The operation computes the selected Fibonacci number, reports progress updates as the calculation proceeds, and permits a pending calculation to be canceled. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 要求取消暫止的背景作業。

span.span: Requests cancellation of a pending background operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提交要求以中止暫止的背景作業，並設定屬性設`true`。 submits a request to terminate the pending background operation and sets the property to `true`. 當您呼叫，背景工作方法，有機會先停止其執行和結束。When you call , your worker method has an opportunity to stop its execution and exit. 背景工作角色程式碼應該定期檢查屬性，以查看若將它設定`true`。The worker code should periodically check the property to see if it has been set to `true`. > [!CAUTION] > 請注意，您的程式碼中事件處理常式可能會完成其工作，進行取消要求，以及您輪詢迴圈可能會遺失設為`true`。Be aware that your code in the event handler may finish its work as a cancellation request is being made, and your polling loop may miss being set to `true`. 在此情況下，旗標中您事件處理常式將不會設定為`true`，即使已取消要求。In this case, the flag of in your event handler will not be set to `true`, even though a cancellation request was made. 這種情況稱為*競爭情形*和是多執行緒程式設計中常見的顧慮。This situation is called a *race condition* and is a common concern in multithreaded programming. 如需有關多執行緒的設計問題，請參閱[Managed 執行緒最佳做法](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md)。For more information about multithreading design issues, see [Managed Threading Best Practices](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法來取消非同步 （「 背景 」） 作業。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to cancel an asynchronous ("background") operation. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#4)]

summary.span: 取得值，指出應用程式是否已經要求取消背景作業。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the application has requested cancellation of a background operation.

value.span: 如果應用程式已要求取消背景作業，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application has requested cancellation of a background operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`true`，則上呼叫方法。If is `true`, then the method has been called on the . 這個屬性適用於使用背景工作執行緒，這應該定期檢查，並中止背景作業，je-li nastavena na `true`。This property is meant for use by the worker thread, which should periodically check and abort the background operation when it is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以查詢有關其取消作業的狀態。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to query a about its cancellation state. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#8)]

Public Custom Event DoWork As DoWorkEventHandler

span.span: Occurs when is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫時，會引發這個事件方法。This event is raised when you call the method. 這是您用來啟動執行耗時的工作的作業。This is where you start the operation that performs the potentially time-consuming work. 中的程式碼事件處理常式應該定期檢查屬性值，並中止作業中，如果它是`true`。Your code in the event handler should periodically check the property value and abort the operation if it is `true`. 當發生這種情況時，您可以設定旗標要`true`，而旗標中您事件處理常式將會設定為`true`。When this occurs, you can set the flag of to `true`, and the flag of in your event handler will be set to `true`. > [!CAUTION] > 請注意，您的程式碼中事件處理常式可能會完成其工作，進行取消要求，以及您輪詢迴圈可能會遺失設為`true`。Be aware that your code in the event handler may finish its work as a cancellation request is being made, and your polling loop may miss being set to `true`. 在此情況下，旗標中您事件處理常式將不會設定為`true`，即使已取消要求。In this case, the flag of in your event handler will not be set to `true`, even though a cancellation request was made. 這種情況稱為*競爭情形*和是多執行緒程式設計中常見的顧慮。This situation is called a *race condition* and is a common concern in multithreaded programming. 如需有關多執行緒的設計問題，請參閱[Managed 執行緒最佳做法](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md)。For more information about multithreading design issues, see [Managed Threading Best Practices](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md). 如果您的作業產生的結果，您可以將結果指派給屬性。If your operation produces a result, you can assign the result to the property. 這可供中的事件處理常式屬性。This will be available to the event handler in the property. 如果該作業引發未處理您的程式碼，例外狀況攔截到例外狀況，並將傳遞到事件處理常式，它會公開為屬性。If the operation raises an exception that your code does not handle, the catches the exception and passes it into the event handler, where it is exposed as the property of . 如果您執行在 Visual Studio 偵錯工具，偵錯工具會中斷在發生未處理的例外狀況的事件處理常式。If you are running under the Visual Studio debugger, the debugger will break at the point in the event handler where the unhandled exception was raised. 如果您有一個以上，您不應該參考其中任何直接，因為這會結合您事件處理常式的特定執行個體。If you have more than one , you should not reference any of them directly, as this would couple your event handler to a specific instance of . 相反地，您應該存取您轉換`sender`參數，在您事件處理常式。Instead, you should access your by casting the `sender` parameter in your event handler. 您必須小心，不要將任何使用者介面中操作物件您事件處理常式。You must be careful not to manipulate any user-interface objects in your event handler. 相反地，透過使用者介面通訊事件。Instead, communicate to the user interface through the events. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用啟動非同步作業的事件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event to start an asynchronous operation. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會啟動非同步作業，當您呼叫。The starts an asynchronous operation when you call . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以等候完成作業。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to wait for completion of a operation. 此程式碼範例屬於較大的範例中所述[如何： 在背景將檔案下載](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-download-a-file-in-the-background.md)。This code example is part of a larger example described in [How to: Download a File in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-download-a-file-in-the-background.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用報告的非同步作業進度的方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to report the progress of an asynchronous operation. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#24)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#24)]

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫時，會引發這個事件方法。This event is raised when you call the method. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用事件以報告給使用者的非同步作業的進度。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event to report the progress of an asynchronous operation to the user. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您需要報告其進度的背景作業，您可以呼叫方法以引發事件。If you need the background operation to report on its progress, you can call the method to raise the event. 屬性值必須是`true`，或將會擲回。The property value must be `true`, or will throw an . 它可以決定要實作的總工作已完成的百分比測量您的背景作業進行有意義的方式。It is up to you to implement a meaningful way of measuring your background operation's progress as a percentage of the total task completed. 若要呼叫方法為非同步，且會立即傳回。The call to the method is asynchronous and returns immediately. 建立的執行緒上的事件處理常式執行。The event handler executes on the thread that created the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法來報告使用者的非同步作業的進度。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to report the progress of an asynchronous operation to the user. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#8)]

Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您需要報告其進度的背景作業，您可以呼叫方法以引發事件。If you need the background operation to report on its progress, you can call the method to raise the event. 屬性值必須`true`，或將會擲回。The property value must `true`, or will throw an . 它可以決定要實作的總工作已完成的百分比測量您的背景作業進行有意義的方式。It is up to you to implement a meaningful way of measuring your background operation's progress as a percentage of the total task completed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法來報告使用者的非同步作業的進度。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to report the progress of an asynchronous operation to the user. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RunWorkerAsync() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Starts execution of a background operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提交要求以啟動作業以非同步方式執行。The method submits a request to start the operation running asynchronously. 當要求提供服務時，引發事件時，這接著會開始執行背景作業。When the request is serviced, the event is raised, which in turn starts execution of your background operation. 如果背景作業已在執行中，呼叫將會引發一次。If the background operation is already running, calling again will raise an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法來啟動非同步作業。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to start an asynchronous operation. 它是中所述之較大範例的一部分[如何： 在背景將檔案下載](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-download-a-file-in-the-background.md)。It is part of a larger example described in [How to: Download a File in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-download-a-file-in-the-background.md). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

span.span: is .

param.name: argument
param.span: 在 事件處理常式中，執行背景作業時使用的參數。

span.span: A parameter for use by the background operation to be executed in the event handler.
Starts execution of a background operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提交要求以啟動作業以非同步方式執行。The method submits a request to start the operation running asynchronously. 當要求提供服務時，引發事件時，這接著會開始執行背景作業。When the request is serviced, the event is raised, which in turn starts execution of your background operation. 如果您的作業需要參數，您可以提供它當做`argument`參數來。If your operation requires a parameter, you can provide it as the `argument` parameter to . 如果背景作業已在執行中，呼叫將會引發一次。If the background operation is already running, calling again will raise an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法來啟動非同步作業。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to start an asynchronous operation. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#3)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RunWorkerCompleted As RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 當背景作業已完成、取消或引發例外狀況時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the background operation has completed, has been canceled, or has raised an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會引發這個事件時事件處理常式傳回。This event is raised when the event handler returns. 如果作業順利完成，其結果會指派中事件處理常式，您可以存取透過結果屬性。If the operation completes successfully and its result is assigned in the event handler, you can access the result through the property. 屬性指出作業已擲回例外狀況。The property of indicates that an exception was thrown by the operation. 屬性指出背景作業是否已處理取消要求。The property of indicates whether a cancellation request was processed by the background operation. 如果您的程式碼中事件處理常式偵測取消要求，藉由檢查旗標和設定旗標來`true`，則旗標也將會設定為`true`.If your code in the event handler detects a cancellation request by checking the flag and setting the flag of to `true`, the flag of also will be set to `true`. > [!CAUTION] > 請注意，您的程式碼中事件處理常式可能會完成其工作，進行取消要求，以及您輪詢迴圈可能會遺失設為`true`。Be aware that your code in the event handler may finish its work as a cancellation request is being made, and your polling loop may miss being set to `true`. 在此情況下，旗標中您事件處理常式將不會設定為`true`，即使已取消要求。In this case, the flag of in your event handler will not be set to `true`, even though a cancellation request was made. 這種情況稱為*競爭情形*和是多執行緒程式設計中常見的顧慮。This situation is called a *race condition* and is a common concern in multithreaded programming. 如需有關多執行緒的設計問題，請參閱[Managed 執行緒最佳做法](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md)。For more information about multithreading design issues, see [Managed Threading Best Practices](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md). 您事件處理常式應該一律會檢查並屬性，才能存取屬性。Your event handler should always check the and properties before accessing the property. 如果引發例外狀況，或已取消作業，存取屬性引發例外狀況。If an exception was raised or if the operation was canceled, accessing the property raises an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用事件以處理非同步作業的結果。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event to handle the result of an asynchronous operation. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#6)]

span.span: if the supports progress updates; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，以`true`如果您想支援進度更新。Set the property to `true` if you want the to support progress updates. 當這個屬性是`true`，使用者程式碼可以呼叫方法以引發事件。When this property is `true`, user code can call the method to raise the event.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 是否支援非同步取消。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the supports asynchronous cancellation.

value.span: 如果 支援取消，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the supports cancellation; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，以`true`如果您想支援取消。Set the property to `true` if you want the to support cancellation. 當這個屬性是`true`，您可以呼叫中斷背景作業的方法。When this property is `true`, you can call the method to interrupt a background operation.
